message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $145. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I'm on a tight budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the product is worth a lot to me. How about we meet in the middle at $137?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we meet at $135?
